intro: Descurainia gilva, commonly known as slender shepherd's purse, is an annual flowering plant native to Eurasia. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes many other cruciferous plants. The plant produces small, triangular seed pods that are characteristic of the genus Descurainia. It typically grows in disturbed soils and is often found in fields and along roadsides. Its botanical features include alternate, linear leaves and small yellow flowers that bloom in early summer.
